definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
household electric appliance/abbr. for 家用電器|家用电器
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
GOME, electronics chain founded in Beijing in 1987
